item.title: About
item.description:
ehab@elfeki:~$feki Platform Engineering professional specializing in AWS infrastructure, CI/CD automation, and Kubernetes orchestration. I architect scalable systems that drive operational excellence, from implementing observability solutions to designing modular infrastructure-as-code patterns.

ehab@elfeki:~$cat /etc/passions Outside the tech world, I disconnect by holding my breath and diving deep into the sea as far as I can.

ehab@elfeki:~$cd /usr/local/skills && find . -type f -name “*.tool” | sort ./automation/GitLab-CI.tool ./automation/GitHub-Actions.tool ./automation/Jenkins.tool ./cloud/AWS-CDK.tool ./cloud/AWS-EC2.tool ./cloud/AWS-EKS.tool ./cloud/AWS-Lambda.tool ./cloud/AWS-S3.tool ./cloud/AWS-Security-Hub.tool ./cloud/CloudFormation.tool ./cloud/Helm.tool ./cloud/Kubernetes.tool ./cloud/Terraform.tool ./monitoring/Datadog.tool ./monitoring/ELK.tool ./monitoring/Grafana.tool ./monitoring/Prometheus.tool ./programming/Go.tool ./programming/Python.tool ./programming/TypeScript.tool ./programming/Java.tool ./programming/Bash.tool ./security/Trivy.tool ./security/SonarQube.tool
